title: There is no actual Lulu hate bandwagon right now
body: It's only 3 people who keep making new threads complaining about her.

replies.body:
Yup you caught me

i called every single diamond players and told them to ban lulu

and of course they listened to me
kappa
Why wouldn't they? They know the legend of your tragedy.
i actually forgot it, what legend is this?

I thought so. It's not a story the Boards will tell you. It's a high elo legend.

Dr. Sona X Rubick was a Darius ADC player. He was so powerful and so wise that he could use his favorite champion and influence the kappaclorians to create... a new meta.

He had such a knowledge of bullying laners that he could even keep the ones he cared about, from losing. The dark side of the meta is a pathway to many winrates that some would consider unnatural. He became so powerful... the only thing he was afraid of was losing his lane, which eventually, of course, he did.

Unfortunately, he taught a Lulu main everything he knew, then his apprentice bullied him out of lane in her sleep. Ironic, he could save others from losing, but not himself.
but who is the lulu main then?

The Lulu main that keeps beating you in lane. :3

Don't let the different names fool you. It's the same one you once taught how to play LoL.

Remember that there are only 3 high elo players, and their smurfs play together all the time.
damn, i got the elo but i can't beat this logic

Now that you have been enlightened, you may now be called Dr. Sona X Rubick the Wise.

Also I would avoid sleeping anywhere near your students from now on. 

Otherwise... Only your tale will live on...
Darth Sona x Rubick the Wise?

Rubick has not yet earned the title of Darth.

There can only be two. No more. No less.

Until Lord Sona X Rubick the Wise enters the inner sanctum of Challenger, he will not receive the Darth title.

The current dark lord is Darth Faker. All the other challengers are his various smurfs he lets his proxys play.

The one that Rubick is challenging for the second title of Darth is....

Darth Pants Are Dragon.

I'm as shocked as you are. Creating this many posts on 1 or 2 subjects over the past few months is a bit absurd IMHO. 

I counted one day and got 10 posts in 10 days about Lethality when it was huge. That wasn't even talking about his other 3 "meme" posts that were actually about lethality as well.

Now he is on about Lulu. Can't wait for his next post tomorrow.

Edit: just checked, 3 posts in 3 days about how Lulu is "OP" or something. He mentions her banrate but come on. He is complaining about a champion that excells with teamwork in a teamwork elo. I don't know about you, but that isn't very smart. Just because she happens to have a bug doesn't mean you need to say "OMG SHE HAS A 32% BAN RATE" but then proceed to say it's because she is OP when it's actually because of a bug that is being fixed next patch.
Can I just be that person who points out the obvious and says I like the Star Wars reference? I logged in just to upvote lol
quality tbh
I only live to spread the legend.

He became so powerful... the only thing he was afraid of was losing his lane, which eventually, of course, he did.
> 
> Unfortunately, he taught a Lulu main everything he knew, then his apprentice bullied him out of lane in her sleep. Ironic, he could save others from losing, but not himself.

This was incredible!
When you get Plagueis memed in league, fuckign highlight of my day

I never realized how many Prequel fans exist in these boards. (Or at least Plaugeis fans)

It brings a tear to my eye.
Its literally one of my favorite memes of all time. It was the meme before memes.

Sweet.

I love this meme as well. I use it when I can't think of anything to say or to end conversations. XD

"I fucked your mom"
"No, you didn't."
"Here are the pictures."
"Wha- uh, um..."
"Whatchu gotta say to THAT?"
"Have you ever heard the tragedy of Darth Plagueis the Wise?"
"You wouldn't dare."
"Darth Plagueis was a-"
"No, NO. ANYTHING BUT THAT."
"...I never liked sand. It's coarse and irr-"
"GAAAAAAH"

And this is what happens when the Boards and FE:H keeps me up.
FE:H?
Fire Emblem: Heroes.

I mean you sunk your credibility for making complaints about champion balance on the boards when you tried to say Jhin's winrate/playrate was okay because 'he feels good to fight'. After telling everyone to 'stfu about jhin' and 'get the fuck off my thread please'. Everyone is just going to call you a hypocrite and jerk, even though you are correct and Lulu is too strong.

> [{quoted}](name=Mira Arya Enthe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7XxwYdzZ,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2017-03-25T22:40:49.758+0000)
>
> I mean you sunk your credibility for making complaints about champion balance on the boards when you tried to say Jhin's winrate/playrate was okay because 'he feels good to fight'.

Nop didn't say it was fine, i said it was better than other champions and even meddler said it, you're just imagining facts i don't even know why
i knew that lethality was broken anyway and that it needed nerfs, and i was right because the only direct nerf jhin got was -0.25 sec on his ult


> [{quoted}](name=Mira Arya Enthe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7XxwYdzZ,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2017-03-25T22:40:49.758+0000)
>
> and 'get the fuck off my thread please'.

yeah, i remember saying this in a vladimir thread where you tried to manipulate people by saying that vladimir wouldn't work botlane because morde didn't work before, even if vladimir is ranged with constant dps which makes him closer to marksmen than morde
but heh, people believed you anyway
> [{quoted}](name=Mira Arya Enthe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7XxwYdzZ,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2017-03-25T22:40:49.758+0000)
>
> Everyone is just going to call you a hypocrite and jerk, even though you are correct and Lulu is too strong.

maybe you're right=? but idc about that, all i want is balance and lulu isn't balanced
i was downvoted before about corki and he ended up nerfed
the same will happen to lulu, so i know that what i'm doing will have some result no matter what lulu mains say. There are even people that realised today on board that lulu is broken simply because of how her stats are hilarious

Oh Lulu is broken. But you are far, far too abrasive, accusatory, circle-jerky, repetitive and bias with your posts. It is like talking to myself, which I cannot stand. As such people are going to dislike you and call out things you say, even when you are correct.
I know Rubick from more than just Lulu threads. Rubick is like me if I was more aggressive. I hate me. So dealing with Rubick is annoying :3

True... though once in a blue moon he _does_ have good points.

Like right now.

Maybe I should make more obnoxious threads on nerfing Lulu ~~just so I can get half of this boards triggered~~
I think Lulu just needs Polymorph nerfed. It is her primary "Any efforts you made up to now to overcome my kit were worthless lel." Button/

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Sona x Rubick,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7XxwYdzZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-24T20:37:46.905+0000)
>
> Yup you caught me
> 
> i called every single diamond players and told them to ban lulu
> 
> and of course they listened to me
> kappa

that is just a brilliant response,

i don't necessarily agree that lulu is an issue.. (i haven't bother to check any data, so have have no opinion yet) 
but that response that amazing +1.

> don't necessarily agree that lulu is an issue..

http://euw.op.gg/champion/lulu/statistics/support
http://www.op.gg/champion/lulu/statistics/support

Look wr (>50%) with pickrate (>25%)
Wasn't good enough for Jhin according to the same people complaining about Lulu.
Jhin wr 46% for 28% pr
Yep he is fine now after nerfs. But the point was the people complaining about Lulu are the same people I saw justify Jhin when he was 55% pr and 52% wr.

Boards justify a busted Ahri as well. 
Jhin is a fan favorite in the league community as is ahri and yasuo and riven. 
Holy trinity of bullshit. Yasuo seemed to kick off vayne from that throne.
Except the boards do not defend Riven or Yasuo.
But Jhin offer more counter play than Lulu and her stupid polymorph... anyway im not like most of this board spending time to crying against strong champ.
http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/lulu/diamond

Spewing out numbers doesn't mean anything. You're calling a champion busted because they're pick ban in one elo. Yet when the boards say the same thing about how a champion is stupid OP because their playrate is high, everyone calls them stupid. 

You're doing the exact same thing you've criticized on so many occasions

> [{quoted}](name=doiminat0r3600,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7XxwYdzZ,comment-id=0001000200000000,timestamp=2017-03-25T03:20:13.063+0000)
>
> Spewing out numbers doesn't mean anything. You're calling a champion busted because they're pick ban in one elo. 

and you think that a champ being pick/banned is balanced? what the hell is wrong with you?

you think that lulu isn't busted simply because you still didn't play against lulu in lane in high elo, i would love to see you trying to play the game in this situation and see how bs it is

you think that people are banning lulu in most of the game for nothing? you need to wake up from your illusion

You think a champion being pick/ban in one elo recently after a bug is a big deal? What are you smoking?

You do know that people don't know whether or not the bug was patched. You do know that people still ban things after nerfs/buffs right? People still banned skarner even after he was nerfed to the ground. 

People may think she still has the glitch. You don't know.

> [{quoted}](name=doiminat0r3600,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7XxwYdzZ,comment-id=000100020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-25T23:02:21.611+0000)
>
> You think a champion being pick/ban in one elo recently after a bug is a big deal? What are you smoking?
> 


keep believing small son, keep beliving that riot doesn't balance the game around plat and above when they JUST SAID IT, and you know something? lulu has 30% ban rate in plat+
with the exact same win rate and pick rate, it's just that diamond players are smarter to ban her more often

> [{quoted}](name=doiminat0r3600,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7XxwYdzZ,comment-id=000100020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-25T23:02:21.611+0000)

they don't care about the bug, it was gamebreaking in 2% of the game,

nobody gives a fuck about polymorph going through spellshields
Who even is that? Someone that thinks the exact same as you? This means nothing.
And everyone perma pick/banning her in ranked kappa

Only the high elo players.

So like three peeps and their smurfs. :3

High plat/low diamond she is pretty much pick/ban as well. 
Either lulu or kog. 
But mostly lulu since she synergizes well with cait too. 
Basically any AA focused adc. 
And high diamond as well in EUW as i could see on several streams today.
Same 3 people
I don't understand why people are so butthurt over Janna and Lulu. "I can't oneshot whoever I want to at any given time without having to think about it, waaaah"
